Documentation & Technical Writing Samples

Sample Procedure Document

Use Case: Operational guides for internal tools, software, or service tasks‚Äîused by support teams, analysts, or non-technical staff.

Format: Step-by-step walkthroughs with numbered tasks, screenshots, and clear subheadings.

Problem Solved: Reduces confusion, rework, and dependency on live help by ensuring users can complete tasks without guesswork.

Ideal for internal knowledge bases, onboarding manuals, or customer-facing how-to resources.

View Sample

Sample Checklist Document

Use Case: Structured onboarding for new hires or clients‚Äîespecially across IT, HR, or admin teams needing repeatable, trackable flows.

Format: Interactive checklist with dependencies, account setup links, and access steps grouped by role or priority.

Problem Solved: Avoids missed steps, delays, or support tickets during onboarding by clearly outlining all required actions.

Ensures a smooth start by removing ambiguity and aligning support across stakeholders.

View Sample

Sample Business Process Diagram

Use Case: Complex workflows like quote approvals or service escalations‚Äîused by operations, product, or enablement teams.

Format: Swimlane-style diagram showing responsibilities, handoffs, and key decision points across roles.

Problem Solved: Prevents miscommunication and delays by making invisible processes visible for alignment and training.

Perfect for aligning stakeholders, streamlining approvals, and training new team members on how systems and people interact.
